tweets.text:
To leave the environment in a better state than we found it we all need to play a part. 

If your organisation is planning a green finance nature project, you could get a grant from our Natural Environment Investment Readiness Fund! 

Apply now: https://t.co/rWe4lzm11j https://t.co/6hYlJUfTsa

Nice to receive a pic + v positive feedback of our recent Kendal urban #nfm project site from owners @SouthLakelandDC. A 'coalition of the willing' led by @SCRiversTrust made this happen inc. @EnvAgencyNW @CumbriaCC & local community. A bog garden & trees = biodiversity gain too! https://t.co/Xj5QRQWzRH

urls.title: Omnishambles - Mark Avery
urls.description: Have you ever had a colleague at work who promises everything but consistently delivers work which is of poor quality and usually arrives late too? They‚Äô re the worst aren‚Äô t they? They may be well-meaning, they may be the life and soul of the party and great fun socially but they are a total waste of space as far as the work environment is concerned. Over-promising and under-delivering work colleagues tend not to stay around for long. DEFRA reminds me of those colleagues. The problem is that we are

tweets.text:
@lookingglas_cat @MarkAvery @DefraGovUK @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @pow_rebecca @VictoriaPrentis @LabourDefra My cows are kept so well it makes Red Tractor look basic.  I would say the same for ALL the beef farmers I know. A badly kept cow does not show profit.

Like RSPCA assured standards - they allowed sow stalls!  FFS!  Such cruelty! Their Free range stocking rates - JUST WRONG!

5 days to go...

Did you know that 55 hectares of habitat and recreational space will be improved as part of the new #Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme?

To read more about the scheme ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/XTYr7iH1wB https://t.co/42Ryehk3sw
That‚Äôs good news and not before time. I am glad @EnvAgencyMids have listened to what local people have been saying about the increases in foul odours. üëç https://t.co/9wMrcJejHu

River #flooding is possible in parts of England until Thursday.

Stay alert and keep away from flooded rivers.

Check your flood risk: https://t.co/BpUpnj1mdd https://t.co/yMdF70Xeyf

@pearldig @EnvAgencyMids Do you mean the National Rivers Authority? 

Also do you mean dredging because that won't stop rain from falling from the sky.

tweets.text: Foliage has been cleared from the Braunstone Brook in #Leicestershire this week, this will lead to less blockages in bad weather. All material cleared is placed in wild areas to help the local habitat #floodaware https://t.co/VVbPOTngod

The #ValueofNature - interesting read and take on #Dasgupta review   #Biosphere as the foundation of #Society and #Economy. #NFM #Norfolk #partnership https://t.co/MBHztzpJpB
